heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare 

(Rabies) Regulations 2020. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited animal health welfare (rabies) regulation 2020 interpretation

heading: 2. In these Regulations—

title: “zone” means the area specified in the Schedule (and shown outlined in red on
heading: 3. (1) The Minister may conduct a census of relevant animals within the
text_raw:
3. (1) The Minister may conduct a census of relevant animals within the 

zone. 

(2) Where the Minister conducts a census under paragraph (1), a person in 
control or possession of a relevant animal shall provide information on all 
animals to which the census applies. 

(3) Where a farm, holding or premises falls within the zone and a 
contiguous part of that farm, holding or premises also falls outside the zone, 
then any part of the farm, holding or premises contiguous with the part within 
the zone is deemed also to be within the zone. 

Prohibited activities
text_norm: 3 (1) minister may conduct census relevant animal within zone (2) minister conduct census paragraph (1) person control possession relevant animal shall provide information animal census applies (3) farm holding premise fall within zone contiguous part farm holding premise also fall outside zone part farm holding premise contiguous part within zone deemed also within zone prohibited activity

title: “zone” means the area specified in the Schedule (and shown outlined in red on
heading: 4. (1) A person shall not hold or permit to be held any sports meeting, hunt,
text_raw:
4. (1) A person shall not hold or permit to be held any sports meeting, hunt, 
fair, market or other sale, exhibition or any gathering of animals within the 
zone that involves a relevant animal. 

(2) A person shall not- 

(a) 

hunt, if such activity involves a relevant animal, or 

(b) participate in any activity or any gathering of animals referred to 

in paragraph (1). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [ ] 3 

Penal provisions

text_raw:

(2) Regulation 4(1) is a penal provision to which section 36(4)(b) of the Act 

applies.

title: “zone” means the area specified in the Schedule (and shown outlined in red on
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Statutory Instrument provides for a census of cats, dogs and ferrets 
present in the zone specified in the Schedule to be carried out by the Minister. 
It also prohibits the organisation of or participation in gatherings of animals 
that involve cats, dogs and ferrets, including hunting activities. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [ ]
